humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, one sentinel lymph node is positive for metastatic ductal carcinoma, and a total of 15 lymph nodes were examined. This information matches Rule 12 (N1) and New Rule 10 (N0 can indicate no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes). However, since there is a positive sentinel lymph node, the N stage is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is N1 because the pathology report indicates that there is 1 out of 15 examined lymph nodes with metastatic ductal carcinoma (part 1 of the report). The substaging information, such as N1mi or N1a, is not provided, so we can only determine the main N stage.
